title: Solve the Open Hand Temple Murders
tags: solve the open hand temple murders
content:
r Yannis and Valeria, a small flying elephant. A scene unfolds where they argue about a criminal case that Sister Yannis is handling, with Valeria suggesting that the accused former criminal is the murderer. Valeria leaves, allowing you to interact with Sister Yannis:

Acknowledge the intensity of their disagreement. Accept Sister Yannis' apology. Disregard the apology and express skepticism. Downplay the significance of swearing in a temple. Utilize your Warlock background to relate to Valeria'
